interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Rosalind Neon Nail Polish Set,Classic Neon Color Series Soak Off UV LED Lamp,Soak Off UV/LED (Neon Color Series)
Review Date: 2020/10/25
Store: nonbranded
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'nonbranded', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '24.00 Count', 'Liquid Volume': '0.33 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '11.26 x 10.51 x 3.7 inches; 2.23 Pounds'}
Review Text: I did my test swatches and most of the colors are a close match to what they show. A few are way off, but still pretty colors. All of my swatches are two coats. The only issue I had was with the black, which isn't shown in my photos. Even after at least 5 minutes, I couldn't get the color to cure. The bottles seem to be pretty full and none are goopy or thick. Although there are quite a few reds and pinks, it's still a good selection, especially for the price.
Review Title: Good set of gel polishes at a great price!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

I did my test swatches and most of the colors are a close match to what they show. A few are way off, but still pretty colors. All of my swatches are two coats. The only issue I had was with the black, which isn't shown in my photos. Even after at least 5 minutes, I couldn't get the color to cure. The bottles seem to be pretty full and none are goopy or thick. Although there are quite a few reds and pinks, it's still a good selection, especially for the price.
Good set of gel polishes at a great price!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Enjoys a variety of nail polish colors, especially vibrant shades (neon, reds, pinks).
- **Formulation Insight:** Favors gel nail products with a shimmery finish.
- **Quality Expectations:** Looks for closely matching colors to product displays and values good consistency in product formulation (e.g., avoiding goopy textures).
- **Experience Level:** Intermediate user, able to perform swatches and evaluate application results.
- **Price Sensitivity:** Seeks value for money, appreciating affordable options without compromising too much on quality.
- **Curing Performance:** Values effective curing time, expressing concern over performance issues, particularly with darker colors like black.
- **Visual Appeal:** Prioritizes aesthetic qualities in nail art products, likely enjoys experimenting with designs.

Overall, the user emphasizes finding well-priced products that offer a wide color selection and reliable performance in application and curing.
